project.description: Patch FPGA image on Colossus DX 1x100G NIC

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_CHASSIS_IP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of Spirent TestCenter chassis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_FPGA_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Directory on remote chassis where FPGA image files are located, example: /mnt/spirent/hypervisor/fpga

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass scp -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ./ColossusDX_1x100G.bit root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP}:${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G_jenkins.bit
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -t -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no "ln -sf ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G_jenkins.bit ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G.bit"
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -t -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no "ls -al ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G.bit"
